formula.name: Burning Ship
formula.reference: Xrn = Xr2 * Xr2 + Xi2 * Xi2 - 6 * Xr2 * Xi2 + Cr; Xin = 4 * abs(Xr * Xi) * (Xr2 - Xi2) + Ci;
formula.perturbation: xrn = 4 * Xr * Xr * Xr * xr + 6 * Xr * Xr * xr * xr + 4 * Xr * xr * xr * xr + xr * xr * xr * xr + 4 * Xi * Xi * Xi * xi + 6 * Xi * Xi * xi * xi + 4 * Xi * xi * xi * xi + xi * xi * xi * xi - 12 * Xr * Xr * Xi * xi - 6 * Xr * Xr * xi * xi - 12 * Xr * xr * Xi * Xi - 24 * Xr * xr * Xi * xi - 12 * Xr * xr * xi * xi - 6 * xr * xr * Xi * Xi - 12 * xr * xr * Xi * xi - 6 * xr * xr * xi * xi + cr; xin = 4 * (Xr * Xr - Xi * Xi) * diffabs(Xr * Xi, Xr * xi + xr * Xi + xr * xi) + 4 * abs(Xr * Xi + Xr * xi + xr * Xi + xr * xi) * (2 * xr * Xr + xr * xr - 2 * xi * Xi - xi * xi) + ci;
